resources.string: You are accelerating too fast. Ease up on the pedal to conserve battery.
You have less than 20 % electricity left, take the next left to find a charging station.
You are driving too fast. Slow down to conserve battery.
You are driving in an area with a lot of traffic. Watch out!
You are now entering Chelyabinsk. Watch out for meteoroids.
for a weekend at the cabin
Invisible Man got 300 § for saving 45 min in the bus lane.
Captain Obvious got 270 § for saving 27 NOK in tolls.
Skeletor got 500 § for saving a polar bear.
Wonder Woman beat Fisto in their "Save Oslo"-challenge.
Invisible Man got 1000 § for driving through Chelyabinsk unharmed.
Ram-Man got the achievement "Master of the Couch".
Moss Man and Trap-Jaw both got 200 § for saving 20 NOK in tolls.
